official_title: To amend the child and adult care food program under the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act to provide alternative reimbursement rates under that program for family or group day care homes located in less populous areas.
subjects: Federal aid to day care centers

summary.text: Amends the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act to provide alternative reimbursement rates under the child and adult care food program for family or group day care homes located in less populous areas.

titles.title: To amend the child and adult care food program under the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act to provide alternative reimbursement rates under that program for family or group day care homes located in less populous areas.
